name: e
description: Euler's number

name: pi
description: Ï€ is commonly defined as the ratio of a circle's circumference C to its diameter d

name: deg
description: deg is the conversion factor between degrees and radians.

name: memory
description: A vector of all user defined symbol names.

name: sin
description: Calculates the sine of a given number.

name: cos
description: Calculates the cosine of a given number.

name: tan
description: Calculates the tagent of a given number.

name: sindeg
description:
Calculates the sine of a given number.
number in degrees

name: cosdeg
description:
Calculates the cosine of a given number.
number in degrees

name: tandeg
description:
Calculates the tagent of a given number.
number in degrees

name: sinh
description: Calculates the hyperbolic sine of a given number.

name: cosh
description: Calculates the hyperbolic cosine of a given number.

name: tanh
description: Calculates the hyperbolic tangent of a given number.

name: asin
description: Calculates the inverse sine of a given number.

name: acos
description: Calculates the inverse cosine of a given number.

name: atan
description: Calculates the inverse tagent of a given number.

name: asindeg
description:
Calculates the inverse sine of a given number.
result in degrees

name: acosdeg
description:
Calculates the inverse cosine of a given number.
result in degrees

name: atandeg
description:
Calculates the inverse tagent of a given number.
result in degrees

name: asinh
description: Calculates the inverse hyperbolic sine of a given number.

name: acosh
description: Calculates the inverse hyperbolic cosine of a given number.

name: atanh
description: Calculates the inverse hyperbolic tangent of a given number.

name: solve
description: Solves a system of linear equations.

name: nsolve
description:
If possible, solve the equation within the limits.
Default limits: -20, 20

name: nintegral
description: Calculates the definite integral of the function for the given limits.

name: nderive
description: Calculates the value of the (grade)th derivative at the specified position. if grade is not specified: grade = 1

name: table
description:
Calculates a list of [x, f(x)] pairs.
min_x <= x <= max_x
| x_n - x_{n + 1} | = step_size
default step_size = 1

name: ln
description: n. a.

name: log
description: n. a.

name: min
description: n. a.

name: max
description: n. a.

name: sqrt
description:
Calculates the square root of v.
v>=0

name: root
description:
Computes the nth root of v.
n, v >= 0

name: delete
description:
Deletes a user defined symbol.
Returns 1 if the deletion was successful, otherwise 0.
